english.segment1: When you're feeling all alone and you've got no friends on the phone. When you've reached your all time low, He'll be around
english.segment2: In your car, in the starts, He's everywhere you are. He's alive and He'll always find you. When your down He's around and He knows..
english.segment3: Of all the places you can go, you will never be alone. Of all the places you could find, there is nowhere you can hide
english.segment4: When you think you've escaped He's right beside you. When you sleep, when you wake, in the midst of your heartbreaks. He is there, and he knows
english.segment5: Make no mistake, He'll be around. Make no mistake, He'll be around
